title: President stresses upon timely completion of Cyber Efficient Parliament initiative
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 23 (APP): President Dr. Arif Alvi Wednesday stressed upon timely completion of President’s Initiative on Cyber Efficient Parliament.
The president chaired a meeting of the Steering Committee on President’s Initiative on Cyber Efficient Parliament at the Aiwan-e-Sadr.
The president was apprised of the progress being made to accomplish the initiative.
The president while appreciating the progress made on the project, directed for completion of digitization of the parliament by January 2023.
He observed that digitization process  would improve its functioning and the legislation process.
He opined that the completion of project would help improve the performance of institutions and bring transparency.
